attributes.action: contact North Trafford College, Dept. of Health & Social Care Section for NVQ streamlined marking procedures - disseminate newly designed assessment papers as a solution to the current HE/FE crisis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many teachers, for years, have predicted the kind of SATS marking problems that are being reported in the press. The idea of NVQs originally was to improve access for non - academics to gain professional status, but in reality arduous and copious assessments recreated the problems that the NVQs were intended to solve - paperwork ! Please, can I urge Rt Hon Balls and Lord Houndwood to consider this quick testing method for submission rather than long - winded essay type discursive papers, which burden FE and HE. Please also consider computerised quick multiple choice testing.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
